Message: Your delivery showed passion, yet I perceive a few pitch inconsistencies and a need for more breath control. With practice, your emotive strength will complement a technically refined voice.
I want to go to a music context, can you tell me the truth of how I performed?

While your enthusiasm shone through, technical aspects like intonation and diaphragmatic support require improvement. Embrace constructive critique, and your artistry will flourish. It feels like I'm failing. I put so much effort into this.
Do you want to listen to me again?
Of course, my intention isn't to discourage but guide. Let's hear it once more, and I'll offer targeted suggestions after reevaluating.
